configurable.i18n_name: SUPER HIGH WAIST SKINNY CROPPED SLIM ILLUSION LUXE PETROL
configurable.i18n_name_de: SUPER HIGH WAIST SKINNY CROPPED SLIM ILLUSION LUXE PETROL
configurable.i18n_name_nl: SUPER HIGH WAIST SKINNY CROPPED SLIM ILLUSION LUXE PETROL
configurable.i18n_name_fr: SUPER HIGH WAIST SKINNY CROPPED SLIM ILLUSION LUXE PETROL
configurable.i18n_name_it: SUPER HIGH WAIST SKINNY CROPPED SLIM ILLUSION LUXE PETROL
configurable.i18n_name_es: SUPER HIGH WAIST SKINNY CROPPED SLIM ILLUSION LUXE PETROL
configurable.i18n_description: Join the Slim Illusion Luxe revolution with A very expensive brand’s super high waist skinny fit crop jeans. This innovative denim is flexible and sophisticated in washed dark petrol blue denim. These women’s super high waist, skinny fit cropped jeans create a slimming feminine fit that molds and moves with you.
configurable.i18n_description_de: Mit der Super High Waist Skinny Fit Crop Jeans von A very expensive brand werden Sie Teil der Slim Illusion Luxe Revolution. Dieser innovative Denim in gewaschenem Petrol ist flexibel und edel zugleich. Diese knöchellangen Skinny-Fit Damenjeans mit superhoher Taille verleihen eine feminine, schmaler wirkende Silhouette und trägen sich wie eine zweite Haut.
configurable.i18n_description_nl: Sluit je aan bij de Slim Illusion Luxe revolution met A very expensive brand's skinny fit crop jeans met superhoge taille. Het innovatieve denim beweegt mee en ziet er in de donkere Petrol wassing geraffineerd uit. De skinny fit crop jeans met superhoge taille zorgt voor een vrouwelijke lijn en past zich aan het lichaam aan.
configurable.i18n_description_fr: La révolution Slim Illusion Luxe est en marche avec le skinny crop à taille super haute de A very expensive brand. Extensible et sophistiqué, ce denim innovant est confectionné dans un denim délavé bleu pétrole. Ce skinny à coupe courte et taille super haute a une coupe slim qui affine la silhouette et suit les mouvements du corps en beauté.
configurable.i18n_description_it: A very expensive brand rivoluzione il concept dello Slim Illusion Luxe con questo jeans skinny cropped a vita altissima. Questo denim innovativo è molto versatile e sofisticato nel finissaggio Dark Petrol Blue. Questo jeans skinny cropped a vita altissima da donna crea una linea molto femminile che modella il fisico assecondando il movimento.
configurable.i18n_description_es: Participa de la revolución del Slim Illusion Luxe con los jeans crop skinny de cintura muy alta de A very expensive brand. Este innovador denim lavado Dark Petrol es flexible y sofisticado. Estos jeans de corte skinny tobillero y cintura muy alta estilizan la figura, se amoldan al cuerpo y acompañan tus movimientos.
